CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aircraft Engines relative to Diesel Fleets?
SRP.A: Aircraft Engines is {below} Diesel Fleets in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aircraft Engines relative to Electric Trucks?
SRP.A: Aircraft Engines is {below} Electric Trucks in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Railway Cars relative to Electric Trucks?
SRP.A: Railway Cars is {above} Electric Trucks in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total vehicle maintenance cost?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Cold Storage Vans}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total vehicle maintenance cost?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Aircraft Engines}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Cold Storage Vans's minimum Vehicle Maintenance Cost in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Cold Storage Vans's minimum Vehicle Maintenance Cost is in {1952}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Railway Cars's minimum Vehicle Maintenance Cost in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Railway Cars's minimum Vehicle Maintenance Cost is in {1959}.

NC.Q: Between 1951 and 1961, did the total Vehicle Maintenance Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 1956 and 1957?
NC.A: The change in total vehicle maintenance cost between 1951 and 1961 was {smaller} than between 1956 and 1957.

NC.Q: Was the total Vehicle Maintenance Cost in 1951 higher or lower than in 1959?
NC.A: The total vehicle maintenance cost in 1951 was {higher} than in 1959.

NC.Q: Between 1952 and 1956, was the average total Vehicle Maintenance Cost higher or lower than between 1952 and 1958?
NC.A: The average total vehicle maintenance cost between 1952 and 1956 was {higher} than between 1952 and 1958.

NC.Q: Between 1956 and 1958, was the average total Vehicle Maintenance Cost higher or lower than between 1959 and 1961?
NC.A: The average total vehicle maintenance cost between 1956 and 1958 was {lower} than between 1959 and 1961.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Cold Storage Vans} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Heavy Machinery and Autonomous Drones first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Heavy Machinery and Autonomous Drones first exchanged leading positions in {1952}.
